title: Is it worth the premium price? - Sony X95K
description: Check out Jackerys Solar Generator 1000 Pro at:   Sony's X95K is a mini-LED TV with wide viewing angles, great colour, a ton of dimming zones,  Dolby Vision, and it works great with the PS5, but does this premium TV stand out against the competition at its high price tag?   Buy Sony X95K 4K HDR Mini LED TV:   Purchases made through some store links may provide some compensation to Linus Media Group.  Want us to unbox something? Make a suggestion at    SUBSCRIBE ON FLOATPLANE:    GET MERCH:   AFFILIATES, SPONSORS & REFERRALS:   PODCAST GEAR:   SUPPORT US ON FLOATPLANE:   FOLLOW US ELSEWHERE ---------------------------------------------------   Twitter:  Instagram:  TikTok:  Facebook:   CHAPTERS --------------------------------------------------- 0:00 I see you've played knifey-spoony 0:05 Unboxing 0:43 Design impressions and unique feet 3:03 IO, central speaker feature, and cable management 6:50 Grand reveal (and awful peels) 7:01 Do the feet look weird? 7:52 Looking at the remote 8:42 Sponsor - Jackery 9:12 Setup, OS, and picture modes 12:00 Checking out the dimming zones 13:20 Speaker impressions 14:12 Overall impressions 15:19 Outro
